mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Received his letter of 3rd; has not a single friend in the mercantile line at Philadelphia of whom he can ask favor by Mery; entire unacquaintance with money matters prevents him from indicating any other source for advance of money; returns note from Marquis de la Fayette to Madame Astory and sends salutations.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lafayette, Marie Joseph Paul Yves Roch Gilbert Du Motier, marquis de, 1757-1834
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1803 October 6, Washington [D.C.] to Mery, n.p.
